title: Every update I get this pop up

embed.description: Take screenshots, screen GIFs, and full page captures you can instantly share now and search later. Get the free app for Windows, Mac, and mobile.

body: What is this? I always click cancel because the publisher is unknown. Should I click allow? It's very annoying

replies.body: It's basically just the League client reaffirming it has firewall permissions each patch. Not having firewall permissions can do some real weird things to your client when it tries to patch and send/receive data, so I'd recommend pressing accept. Depending on your firewall settings I believe it will either appear each time until you allow and then not again, or every patch.
